page.title: 09Farm Visits.
page.content: Our project study area mainly contains Farmland but we do have some of{ {Threemilestone}on our grid reference. We paid several visits to farms. Both Dairy and Farms that keep livestock. But we also went to Agricultural Merchants e.g. Cornwall Farmers at Truro Station. They sell animal food for a variety of animals. They also stock Fertilizers. Fertilizers are special chemicals to improve growing e.g. Flowers,grass and vegetables. There is one more Cornwall Farmers which sells pesticides which help to kill off or control bugs that do damage to crops. They also sell generators plus metal poles to tie electric wire to. We went to{Killiow {Country Park.}They showed us cows, chickens and lots more livestock. They showed us the old farming equipment used long ago.
